text: <@UV8F3SRGA> - <@U010H9HHT4M> is creating a training manual for healthcare folks and volunteers. He is gathering material for specific topics to create the manual.

elements.text: is creating a training manual for healthcare folks and volunteers. He is gathering material for specific topics to create the manual.

text: <@U0107JERE9L> , <@UV8B0679P> and <@U010H9HHT4M> are we talking about the hospitals in Addis Abeba? the clinics? I worked in St. Paul Hospital to set up the biomedical workshop and one of the requirement was to have and SOP for each equipment in cleaning, preventive maintenance etc that was approved by the medical director. If I remember correctly I have also given training on PPE etc. MOH requires each hospital to have an SOP , training for staff. Are we working with them? who is approving the content? Can we schedule a meeting to discuss? I will be happy to share my knowledge. I don't want to post those files here without better understanding how it is going to be used and it needs to be adapted for this pandemic.

text:
<!channel> <#C011H7HG0Q5|proj-diy-ventilator> engineering team is in the ideation phase of building rapidly manufactured, low-cost ventilators. We need valuable input from our health care professionals to brainstorm ideas. We would like to get your perspective of the pros and cons of current ventilation in Ethiopia. 
 We need your help clearly defining ventilation problems we should solve that’d have the most impact for Ethiopia.
 We are calling for:
•          Doctors, nurses, and other medical professionals in Ethiopia
Please fill out this questionnaire: <https://forms.gle/aXh7KHv6gmLuSunb8> in efforts to help us gather user need requirements.

attachments.title: User Need Requirement - DIY Ventilators
attachments.text: Clearly State Problem To Be Solved BY defining user need: User need describes how ventilator is going to be used. User needs helps us establish the framework for our ventilator product design. Intended use describes the clinical issue our product addresses. Indications for Use pertains to clinical applications use, environment, and end user.
attachments.fallback: Google Docs: User Need Requirement - DIY Ventilators
